mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (userName, userEmail, userPw, phoneNum, gender, birth, nickname, profile ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPw}, #{phoneNum}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{nickname}, #{profile});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE userEmail = #{email};
SELECT userEmail, userPw FROM users WHERE userEmail = #{check_id} and userPw = #{check_pw} ;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE userEmail = #{check_id} and userPw = #{check_pw} and permission = 'N' ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loginlog (userEmail, loginDate) VALUES(#{userEmail}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'));
mapper.select: select a.userEmail, u.nickname from authority a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.userEmail = u.userEmail WHERE (a.userEmail like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or u.nickName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) and a.teamNo=#{teamNo}
select userEmail, userPw, userName, nickname, permission, profile from users where userEmail=#{email};
